nodes.text: Chandrilan Blue '439 was a vintage of wine made from Chandrilan grappaberries grown in vineyards outside the city of Nayli on the Core World Chandrila.

The most well-known vintage of Chandrilan wine, a bottle of Chandrilan Blue '439 was served alongside grilled t'surys with spongewort garnish to the Jedi Jax Pavan while he hid out with Rokko the Hutt in the Coruscant underworld during the Great Jedi Purge in 19 BBY.
Chandrilan Blue '439 was first mentioned in Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves as part of the Coruscant Nights trilogy.
